## ‚úÖ Checklist
- [ ] Paper is original work
- [ ] Code/data available (if applicable)

---

## üîÑ Review Process
1. **Submit** this issue
2. **Wait** for 2 reviewers to be assigned
3. **Discuss** revisions in comments below
4. **Make changes** in your repository
5. **Get approved** when both reviewers comment "APPROVED"
6. **Published** automatically as PDF

*Note: Review typically takes 2-3 weeks*
